price: Odoo isaan lamaan (samiifi dachii) keessa Rabbiin malee gabbaramtoonni biraa jiraatanii lamaan isaaniituu ni badu ture, Rabbiin Gooftaa Arshii ta’e waan kaafiroonni (Isaan) jedhan irraa qulqullaa’e!
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: law kāna fīhimā ālihatun illā al-lahu lafasadatā fasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
